no-meme-msg: You currently haven’t saved any memes.
about_description: Meme-Craft lets you create fun, downloadable, and shareable memes using your own images. Add text, choose colours, and position captions exactly how you like. It’s simple, playful, and perfect for anyone who wants to make memes and have them ready to save or share.
mission_text: Our mission is to make meme creation accessible, fun, and fast for everyone. We aim to help people express their humour, creativity, and ideas through memes in a simple and enjoyable way.
contact_text: Have questions, feedback, or ideas? Reach out to us at contact mika.ridley26@gmail.com - we’d love to hear from you!
